## PlainPacker.unpack() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Unpack returns unpacked message from transport envelope

**Signature:**

```typescript
unpack(envelope: Uint8Array): Promise<BasicMessage>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  envelope | Uint8Array | packed envelope (serialized json with media type) |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[BasicMessage](./js-sdk.basicmessage.md)&gt;

`Promise<BasicMessage>`
